home.subtitle: Let's build together the transition of the web and metaverse

hello.title: <HELLO WORLD>
hello.p1: Hello and welcome to METALATAM, an instance of digital mapping where web3 developers, digital architects, marketers and brands come together to reflect on the future we are living.
hello.p2: The call is that from Chile we promote the development, we unite and generate instances that promote local startups in order to scale to the world.

2.title: Blockchain
2.description: Blockchain, its uses, understanding and use cases.

3.title: Web3
3.description: What it is and how it changes the way we understand our data on the internet.

4.title: Legality
4.description: The future comes loaded with regulatory challenges. The question is, how are we going to organize the party.

5.title: Dev World
5.description: IT as the center of the business. Solve your email problem on your own.

6.title: Metaverse
6.description: Create immersive experiences with people at the center.

1.title: Talks
1.description: Wise men talk, we all learn.

2.title: Meet Up
2.description: Meet people in the ecosystem, find a partner or a VC, anything can happen while we talk.

3.title: Expo Stuff
3.description: Tell the world what you can do for people.

4.title: Demo Moment
4.description: The moment of truth, crashing your software is highly probable.

1.title: Developers
1.description: We want to create opportunities for recreation, where knowledge and networking prevail.

2.title: Entrepreneurs
2.description: This is the time to tell the world what you are working on. Finding that partner or investor is the goal.

3.title: Companies
3.description: VC's, managers and decision makers in a space to plan their next adventure.

1.title: Expo Stuff
1.description: Expose your brand to developers and consumers. A booth that surprises the audience.

2.title: Talks
2.description: Every company can send it's best champion or a sage. Choose your strategy.

items.a: Logo on the organizer website www.azomland.com
items.b: Logo on the event website www.metalatam.xyz
items.c: Logo on the screens on the day of the event
items.d: Logo in the press announcements mentioning sponsor level
items.e: Logo in promotional video of the event
items.g: Exhibit booth on the day of the event*
items.h: Announcement at the beginning of each talk as a sponsor
items.boothA: 52' Led monitor to project videos or images
items.boothD: Tables and chairs for the team
items.k: Access to give a talk by a team member
items.l: Airfare for the team or speaker
items.n: We are negotiating with a hotel to provide accommodations at a better price and with expedited access to the event

organizer.title: Organizer
organizer.description: The metaverse where adults and brands are safe. We want to be the meeting point where people connect, enjoy and live experiences in the metaverse.

footer.title: Be part of the future, be part of Metalatam
